DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to investigate the effects of the transdermal patch on the endometrium in healthy women who require contraception.
DOC.brief_title: Transdermal Contraceptive Patch - Endometrial Effects Study
DOC.criteria: Requiring contraception Normal cervical smear Smokers not older than 30 years History of regular cyclic menstrual periods Pregnancy or lactation Obesity (BMI> 30 kg/m2) Significant skin reaction to transdermal preparations or sensitivity to surgical / medical tape Any disease that may worsen under hormonal treatment (cardiovascular, liver, metabolic) Use of other contraceptive methods than study medication
